message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been valued at $120 by you. Considering its quality and unique features, I would like to propose a price of $110 for it. This offer allows you to enjoy significant savings while acquiring a valuable item. I believe this price reflects the true value and benefits of the product, making it an attractive deal for you. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
